description: Enable your agents to interact with Discord through a selfbot interface using the Model Context Protocol. Automate and extend Discord functionalities by integrating MCP tools and resources seamlessly. Enhance your Discord automation workflows with this MCP server implementation.

botId.description: Default bot ID for slash commands (optional)

capabilities.name: get_server_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed discord server information

capabilities.name: get_user_id_by_name
capabilities.description: Get a Discord user's ID by username in a guild for ping usage <@id>.

capabilities.name: list_channels
capabilities.description: List of all channels

capabilities.name: create_text_channel
capabilities.description: Create a new text channel

capabilities.name: delete_channel
capabilities.description: Delete a channel

capabilities.name: send_message
capabilities.description: Send a message to a specific channel

capabilities.name: read_messages
capabilities.description: Read recent message history from a specific channel

capabilities.name: edit_message
capabilities.description: Edit a message from a specific channel

capabilities.name: delete_message
capabilities.description: Delete a message from a specific channel

capabilities.name: send_private_message
capabilities.description: Send a private message to a specific user

capabilities.name: read_private_messages
capabilities.description: Read recent message history from a specific user

capabilities.name: add_reaction
capabilities.description: Add a reaction (emoji) to a specific message

capabilities.name: remove_reaction
capabilities.description: Remove a specified reaction (emoji) from a message

capabilities.name: list_roles
capabilities.description: List all roles in a Discord server

capabilities.name: create_role
capabilities.description: Create a new role in a Discord server

capabilities.name: delete_role
capabilities.description: Delete a role from a Discord server

capabilities.name: add_role_to_member
capabilities.description: Add a role to a guild member

capabilities.name: remove_role_from_member
capabilities.description: Remove a role from a guild member

capabilities.name: create_category
capabilities.description: Create a new category for channels

capabilities.name: delete_category
capabilities.description: Delete a category

capabilities.name: find_category
capabilities.description: Find a category ID using name and server ID

capabilities.name: list_channels_in_category
capabilities.description: List of channels in a specific category

capabilities.name: create_webhook
capabilities.description: Create a new webhook on a specific channel

capabilities.name: delete_webhook
capabilities.description: Delete a webhook

capabilities.name: list_webhooks
capabilities.description: List of webhooks on a specific channel

capabilities.name: send_webhook_message
capabilities.description: Send a message via webhook

capabilities.name: send_slash_command
capabilities.description: Send a slash command to a bot in a channel. Returns the complete raw message object with all embeds, attachments, and metadata. Bot ID is optional if configured as default.

capabilities.name: get_bot_commands
capabilities.description: Get available slash commands for a specific bot (experimental)

capabilities.name: find_channel
capabilities.description: Find a channel type and ID using name and server ID
